welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Panama City Beach! Get ready to experience the vibrant energy and stunning beauty of our coastal city, known for its white sand beaches and endless outdoor activities. We invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves as a hub for several major airlines, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport is primarily used for regional flights and offers a more relaxed atmosphere for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
